Element.Name: Specification identification
Element.Description: Identifies the specification of content and rules that apply to the transaction.

Element.Name: Business process type identifier
Element.Description: Identifies the BII profile or business process context in which the transaction appears.

Element.Name: Document Identity
Element.Description: Waste Notification document identity

Element.Name: Document Issue Date
Element.Description: Document creation Date.

Element.Name: Document Issue Time
Element.Description: Document creation Time.

Element.Name: Waste Notification Type Code
Element.Description: Waste Notification Type Code.

Element.Name: Consignment Quantity
Element.Description: Estimated total no of shipments for this Waste Notification.

Element.Name: Signature
Element.Description: To attach signatures to this document.

Element.Name: Signature ID.
Element.Description: Used to specify the role of the signing person.

Element.Name: Note.
Element.Description: To include any textual information.

Element.Name: Validation date.
Element.Description: Validation date.

Element.Name: Validation time.
Element.Description: Validation time.

Element.Name: Signature Method.
Element.Description: Text to describe the signature method.

Element.Name: Signatory Party
Element.Description: Describes the party that is signing.

Element.Name: Party identification
Element.Description: Identifies the party that is signing.

Element.Name: Party ID
Element.Description: Identifies the party that is signing.

Element.Name: Party name
Element.Description: The name of the party that is signing.

Element.Name: Party Name
Element.Description: The name of the party that is signing.

Element.Name: Signature Person
Element.Description: Defines the person that is signing.

Element.Name: ID of signature person, ID06 card number or similar
Element.Description: The identity of the signing person.

Element.Name: Name of the signing person.
Element.Description: Name of the signing person.

Element.Name: Telephone for the signing person.
Element.Description: Telephone no to the signing person.

Element.Name: E-mail address of the signing person.
Element.Description: E-mail address for the signing person.

Element.Name: Digital Signature Attachment
Element.Description: To include the actual signature.

Element.Name: Embedded Binary object.
Element.Description: The referenced document (signature) can here be inserted as a binary object. filename is the name of the attachment when stored as a document.

Element.Name: External reference
Element.Description: Link to the signature that is available externally.

Element.Name: URI
Element.Description: Link to the signature that is available externally.

Element.Name: The sender of the Notification Document
Element.Description: This party defines the company that signs and sends the Waste Notification Document.

Element.Name: Endpoint ID
Element.Description: The identity used to send the Waste Notification Document electronically..

Element.Name: Party Identification
Element.Description: This identity defines the company that signs and sends the Waste Notification Document.

Element.Name: Identity
Element.Description: This identity identifies the company that signs and sends the Waste Notification Document.

Element.Name: Party Name
Element.Description: Party name.

Element.Name: Party Name
Element.Description: The name of this party.

Element.Name: Postal address
Element.Description: Postal address of the sender party

Element.Name: Address line 1.
Element.Description: The main address line in a postal address usually the street name and number.

Element.Name: Address line 2.
Element.Description: An additional address line in a postal address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line. Common use are secondary house number in a complex or in a building.

Element.Name: City.
Element.Description: The common name of the city where the postal address is. The name is written in full rather than as a code.

Element.Name: Post code.
Element.Description: The identifier for an addressable group of properties according to the relevant national postal service, such as a ZIP code or Post Code.

Element.Name: Country subdivision.
Element.Description: TFor specifying a region, county, state, province etc. within a country by using text.

Element.Name: Address line
Element.Description: One more address line that can be used to provide the full address.

Element.Name: Address line 3.
Element.Description: An additional address line in an address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line.

Element.Name: Country
Element.Description: Country code.

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: A code that identifies the country.The lists of valid countries are registered with the ISO 3166-1 Maintenance agency, "Codes for the representation of names of countries and their subdivisions". Codes must be according to the alpha-2 representation.

Element.Name: Contact
Element.Description: The primary contact for this party.

Element.Name: Name
Element.Description: The name of the contact person.

Element.Name: Telephone number
Element.Description: A phone number for the contact person. If the person has a direct number, this is that number.

Element.Name: Contact email address.
Element.Description: The e-mail address for the contact person. If the person has a direct e-mail this is that email.

Element.Name: Receiver information
Element.Description: This party defines the company that receives the Waste Notification document.

Element.Name: Receiver party electronic address.
Element.Description: Identifies the consignee party's electronic address

Element.Name: Party Identification
Element.Description: This party identifies the company that receives the Waste Notification Document.

Element.Name: Receiver party identifier.
Element.Description: The receiving party identifier.

Element.Name: Party Name
Element.Description: Party name.

Element.Name: Party Name
Element.Description: The name of this party.

Element.Name: Postal address
Element.Description: Postal address of the receiver

Element.Name: Address line 1
Element.Description: The main address line in a postal address usually the street name and number.

Element.Name: Address line 2
Element.Description: An additional address line in a postal address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line. Common use are secondary house number in a complex or in a building.

Element.Name: City
Element.Description: The common name of the city where the postal address is. The name is written in full rather than as a code.

Element.Name: Post code
Element.Description: The identifier for an addressable group of properties according to the relevant national postal service, such as a ZIP code or Post Code.

Element.Name: Country subdivision
Element.Description: For specifying a region, county, state, province etc. within a country by using text.

Element.Name: Address line
Element.Description: One more address line that can be used to provide the full address.

Element.Name: Address line 3
Element.Description: Used for any other additional address information.

Element.Name: Country
Element.Description: The country where this part is.

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: A code that identifies the country.The lists of valid countries are registered with the ISO 3166-1 Maintenance agency, "Codes for the representation of names of countries and their subdivisions". Codes must be according to the alpha-2 representation.

Element.Name: Delivery Contact information
Element.Description: Contact information

Element.Name: Contact person name
Element.Description: The name of the contact person.

Element.Name: Contact telephone number
Element.Description: A phone number for the contact person. If the person has a direct number, this is that number.

Element.Name: Contact email address
Element.Description: The e-mail address for the contact person. If the person has a direct e-mail this is that email.

Element.Name: The Notifier Party
Element.Description: This party defines the company that responsible for the Waste Notification.

Element.Name: Party Identification
Element.Description: This identity defines the company that is responsible for the Waste Notification.

Element.Name: Identity
Element.Description: This identity identifies the company that is responsible for the Waste Notification.

Element.Name: The Customs Party
Element.Description: This party defines the Authority in each country involved that must give a consent to the waste movement.

Element.Name: Industry Classification Code
Element.Description: To describe if this "Competent Authority" is for Export (E), Transit (T) or Import (I).

Element.Name: Party Identification
Element.Description: This identity defines the Authority in each country involved that must give a consent to the waste movement.

Element.Name: Identity
Element.Description: This identity identifies the Authority in each country involved that must give a consent to the waste movement.

Element.Name: The Disposal Facility Party
Element.Description: This party defines the company that receiving the Waste for Disposal. Always include this party or the RecoveryFacilityParty, but never both.

Element.Description: This identity defines the company that will receive the waste for Disposal.

Element.Description: This identity identifies the company that will receive the waste for Disposal.

Element.Description: Site of Waste Disposal

Element.Name: Identity of the location.
Element.Description: Identifies the location where the waste will be disposed of.

Element.Description: The name of the location where the waste will be disposed of.

Element.Name: Address of the location
Element.Description: The address of the location where the waste will be disposed of.

Element.Name: Country for Location.
Element.Description: Country.

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: A code that identifies the country. The lists of valid countries are registered with the ISO 3166-1 Maintenance agency, "Codes for the representation of names of countries and their subdivisions". Codes must be according to the alpha-2 representation.

Element.Name: Location coordinate
Element.Description: To specify the coordinates.

Element.Name: Coordinate system code
Element.Description: Always "EPSG:3857" by definition.

Element.Name: Latitude degrees
Element.Description: The X coordinate. Use degrees with decimals.

Attribute.Name: Latitude degrees unit of measure
Attribute.Description: The unit of measure that applies to the latitude degrees.

Element.Name: Longitude degrees
Element.Description: The Y coordinate. Use degrees with decimals.

Attribute.Name: Longitude degrees unit of measure
Attribute.Description: The unit of measure that applies to the longitude degrees.

Element.Name: Shipment
Element.Description: Shipment information

Element.Name: Identity
Element.Description: Identifies a shipment.

Element.Name: Information
Element.Description: Additional Information.

Element.Name: Total Transport Handling Unit Quantity
Element.Description: The number of pieces of transport handling equipment (pallets, boxes, cases, etc.) in this shipment.

Element.Name: Consignment
Element.Description: Consignment information

Element.Name: Identity
Element.Description: An association to Consignment covering the shipment. Unique number assigned to goods, both for import and export.

Element.Name: Hazardous Risk Indicator.
Element.Description: An indication that the transported goods in this consignment are subject to an international regulation concerning the carriage of dangerous goods (true) or not (false).

Element.Name: Technology Employed
Element.Description: Technology employed for Recovery/Disposal.

Element.Name: Handling Code
Element.Description: The handling required for this waste, expressed as a code (D-code/R-code).

Element.Name: Original Departure Country
Element.Description: Original Departure Country.

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: A code that identifies the country. The lists of valid countries are registered with the ISO 3166-1 Maintenance agency, "Codes for the representation of names of countries and their subdivisions". Codes must be according to the alpha-2 representation.

Element.Name: Final Destination Country
Element.Description: Final Destination Country.

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: A code that identifies the country. The lists of valid countries are registered with the ISO 3166-1 Maintenance agency, "Codes for the representation of names of countries and their subdivisions". Codes must be according to the alpha-2 representation.

Element.Name: Transit Country
Element.Description: Transit Country.

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: A code that identifies the country. The lists of valid countries are registered with the ISO 3166-1 Maintenance agency, "Codes for the representation of names of countries and their subdivisions". Codes must be according to the alpha-2 representation.

Element.Name: Transport handling unit
Element.Description: A description of individual handling units in which the line items are packed. An item of any composition established for transport and/or storage that needs to be managed through the supply chain.

Element.Name: Handling unit type code
Element.Description: Type of Transport Handling Unit. Use UN/ECE Recommendation 21.

Element.Name: Handling Code
Element.Description: The handling for this transporthandling unit expressed as a code

Attribute.Name: Identifier for codelist for handling code
Attribute.Description: An identifier for the codelist used for the handling code

Element.Name: Handling instructions
Element.Description: The handling for this transporthandling unit expressed as a text

Element.Name: Office of Import Location
Element.Description: Location where the waste arrives to the importing country.

Element.Name: Identity
Element.Description: This identity identifies the location where the waste arrives to the importing country.

Element.Name: Name of the location
Element.Description: The name of the location where the waste arrives to the importing country.

Element.Name: Office of Export Location
Element.Description: Location where the waste leaves the exporting country.

Element.Name: Identity
Element.Description: This identity identifies the location where the waste leaves the exporting country.

Element.Name: Name of the location
Element.Description: The name of the location where the waste leaves the exporting country.

Element.Name: Office of Transit Location
Element.Description: Location where the waste arrives to a transit country.

Element.Name: Identity
Element.Description: This identity identifies the location where the waste arrives to a transit country.

Element.Name: Name of the location
Element.Description: The name of the location where the waste arrives to a transit country.

Element.Name: Document Reference
Element.Description: A reference to a document related to or relevant for this consignment.

Element.Name: Identity
Element.Description: The identity of the referenced document.

Element.Name: Document Type Code
Element.Description: The Type code of the referenced document.

Element.Name: Document Type
Element.Description: The Type (text) of the referenced document.

Element.Name: Attachment
Element.Description: The referenced document as an attachment to the document from which it is referenced.

Element.Name: Embedded binary object
Element.Description: The referenced document can here be inserted as a binary object.

Element.Name: External reference
Element.Description: A reference to an attached document that is external to the document(s) being exchanged.

Element.Name: Address to internet resource
Element.Description: The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that identifies the external object as an Internet resource.

Element.Name: Goods Item.
Element.Description: A goods item included in this shipment.

Element.Name: Line number identity
Element.Description: Line Number.

Element.Name: Waste quantity
Element.Description: The quantity to be moved.

Element.Name: Item information
Element.Description: Item information.

Element.Name: Description
Element.Description: Designation and Composition of the Waste.

Element.Name: Item name
Element.Description: A short name for an item.

Element.Name: Additional information
Element.Description: Process of the waste generation.

Element.Name: Buyer's item identification
Element.Description: Buyer's item identification.

Element.Name: Buyers item identification
Element.Description: An identifier, assigned by the buyer, for the item. Associates the item with its identification according to the buyer's system.

Element.Name: Seller's item identification
Element.Description: Seller's item identification.

Element.Name: Seller's item identification
Element.Description: An identifier, assigned by the seller, for the item. Associates the item with its identification according to the seller's system.

Element.Name: Standard item identification
Element.Description: Standard item identification. Only one Standard Item Number can be used per line.

Element.Name: Standard item identification
Element.Description: An item identifier based on a registered scheme. Associates the item with its identification according to a standard system.

Element.Name: Commodity classification
Element.Description: To classify when an item number is not sufficient.

Attribute.Description: The identification scheme identifier of the Item classification identifier.
The name of the Identification scheme identifier when @listID = ZZZ. Must be provided when @listID = ZZZ.

Element.Name: Hazardous Item
Element.Description: Contains information on the Hazardous item.

Element.Name: Identifier
Element.Description: An identifier for this hazardous item.

Element.Name: Additional Information
Element.Description: Text providing further information about the hazardous substance.

Element.Name: UN Code
Element.Description: The UN code for this kind of hazardous item.

Element.Name: Technical Name
Element.Description: The full technical name of a specific hazardous substance contained in this goods item.
Element.Value: Corrosive liquid, n.o.s., 8, UN 1760, II (contains Octanoyl chloride)

Element.Name: Category Name
Element.Description: The name of the category of hazard that applies to the Item.

Element.Name: Hazardous Category Code
Element.Description: A code signifying a kind of hazard for a material.

Element.Name: Hazard Class ID
Element.Description: An identifier for the hazard class applicable to this hazardous item as defined by the relevant regulation authority (e.g., the IMDG Class Number of the SOLAS Convention of IMO and the ADR/RID Class Number for the road/rail environment).

Element.Name: Net Weight Measure
Element.Description: Net weight of the Hazardous item.

Attribute.Name: Measure unit of measure
Attribute.Description: The unit of measure that applies to the Net Weight.

Element.Name: Net Volume Measure
Element.Description: Net volume of the Hazardous item.

Attribute.Name: Measure unit of measure
Attribute.Description: The unit of measure that applies to the Net Volume.

Element.Name: Hazardous Goods Transit
Element.Description: Information related to the transit of this kind of hazardous goods.

Element.Name: Packing Criteria Code
Element.Description: A code signifying the packaging requirement for transportation of the hazardous goods as assigned by IATA, IMDB, ADR, RID etc.

Element.Name: Emergency Temperature
Element.Description: The threshold temperature at which emergency procedures apply in the handling of temperature-controlled goods.

Element.Name: Attribute ID
Element.Description: An identifier for this temperature measurement.

Element.Name: Measure
Element.Description: The value of this temperature measurement.

Attribute.Name: Measure unit of measure
Attribute.Description: The unit of measure that applies to the Emergency Temperature.

Element.Name: Additional Item Property
Element.Description: An additional property of this item.
ID of the property if assigned by an Agency

Element.Name: Name
Element.Description: The Name of the Item Property.

Element.Name: Item Property code
Element.Description: Code for the item property according to a property code system.

Attribute.Name: Name code list id.
Attribute.Description: An identifier for the code list used for the Name code, this is bilaterally agreed

Element.Name: Value
Element.Description: The Value of the Item Property.

Element.Name: Item property unit of measure
Element.Description: The unit of measure in which the property value is stated, if relevant. May not be relevant when properties are descriptive.

Element.Name: Property classification
Element.Description: Standardized and predefined classification of items properties.

Element.Name: Shipment Stage
Element.Description: Describes the step of the transport. To be repeated if more than ome step is needed.

Element.Name: Shipment Stage identifier
Element.Description: Sequence number of the Shipment Stage.

Element.Name: Carrier Party
Element.Description: The party executing the transport in the Shipment Stage

Element.Name: Party Identification
Element.Description: An identifier for this party.

Element.Name: Carrier party identity
Element.Description: The identifier of the Carrier party

Element.Name: Party Name
Element.Description: The name of the Carrier party

Element.Name: Carrier name
Element.Description: The name of the Carrier party

Element.Name: Postal address
Element.Description: The address for the Carrier.

Element.Name: Address line 1
Element.Description: The main address line in a postal address usually the street name and number.

Element.Name: Address line 2
Element.Description: An additional address line in a postal address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line. Common use are secondary house number in a complex or in a building.

Element.Name: City
Element.Description: The common name of the city where the postal address is. The name is written in full rather than as a code.

Element.Name: Post code
Element.Description: The identifier for an addressable group of properties according to the relevant national postal service, such as a ZIP code or Post Code.

Element.Name: Country subdivision
Element.Description: For specifying a region, county, state, province etc. within a country by using text.

Element.Name: Address line 3
Element.Description: An additional address line in an address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line.

Element.Name: Country
Element.Description: Country code.

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: A code that identifies the country. The lists of valid countries are registered with the ISO 3166-1 Maintenance agency, "Codes for the representation of names of countries and their subdivisions". Codes must be according to the alpha-2 representation.

Element.Name: Contact person name
Element.Description: The contact of the Carrier party.

Element.Name: Contact name
Element.Description: The contact name.

Element.Name: Contact telephone number
Element.Description: The phone number of the contact.

Element.Name: Contact email address
Element.Description: The electronic mail of the contact.

Element.Name: Transport means
Element.Description: The means of transport used in this shipment stage.

Element.Name: Transport means type code
Element.Description: The means of transport used in this shipment stage.

Element.Name: Delivery information
Element.Description: Delivery information

Element.Name: Delivery location
Element.Description: The location where the goods is delivered.
Identifies the delivery location.

Element.Name: Name of the delivery location
Element.Description: The name of the delivery location.

Element.Name: Address of the delivery location
Element.Description: The address of the delivery location.
The main address line in a postal address usually the street name and number.

Element.Name: Address line 2
Element.Description: An additional address line in a postal address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line. Common use are secondary house number in a complex or in a building.

Element.Name: City
Element.Description: The common name of the city where the postal address is. The name is written in full rather than as a code.

Element.Name: Post code
Element.Description: The identifier for an addressable group of properties according to the relevant national postal service, such as a ZIP code or Post Code.

Element.Name: Country subdivision
Element.Description: For specifying a region, county, state, province etc. within a country by using text.

Element.Name: Address line 3
Element.Description: An additional address line in an address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line.

Element.Name: Country
Element.Description: Country code.

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: A code that identifies the country. The lists of valid countries are registered with the ISO 3166-1 Maintenance agency, "Codes for the representation of names of countries and their subdivisions". Codes must be according to the alpha-2 representation.

Element.Name: Location coordinate
Element.Description: To specify the coordinates.

Element.Name: Coordinate system code
Element.Description: Always "EPSG:3857" by definition.

Element.Name: Latitude degrees
Element.Description: The X coordinate. Use degrees with decimals.

Attribute.Name: Latitude degrees unit of measure
Attribute.Description: The unit of measure that applies to the latitude degrees.

Element.Name: Longitude degrees
Element.Description: The Y coordinate. Use degrees with decimals.

Attribute.Name: Longitude degrees unit of measure
Attribute.Description: The unit of measure that applies to the longitude degrees.

Element.Name: Delivery Party.
Element.Description: The Party receiving e shipment.

Element.Name: Party Identification
Element.Description: Party identification

Element.Name: Identity of the Delivery Party.
Element.Description: Identifies the Delivery Party.

Attribute.Name: Deliver party registration identifier identification scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: The identification scheme identifier of the deliverparty identifier.

Element.Name: Party Name
Element.Description: Party Name

Element.Name: Name of the Consignee.
Element.Description: The name of the Consignee.

Element.Name: Postal Address of Consignee.
Element.Description: Postal Address.

Element.Name: Street Name for Consignee.
Element.Description: Street name.

Element.Name: Additional Street Name for Consignee.
Element.Description: Additional street name.

Element.Name: City Name for Consignee.
Element.Description: Name of city.

Element.Name: Postal Zone for Consignee.
Element.Description: Zip-code.

Element.Name: Country SubEntity for Consignee.
Element.Description: Country Sub-entity.

Element.Name: Address Line for Consignee.
Element.Description: Additional address line.

Element.Name: Address Line for Consignee.
Element.Description: Used for any other additional address information.

Element.Name: Country for Consignee.
Element.Description: Country.

Element.Name: Country Code for Consignee.
Element.Description: Country code.

Element.Name: Consignee Contact information
Element.Description: Contact information

Element.Name: Contact person name
Element.Description: The name of the contact person.

Element.Name: Contact telephone number
Element.Description: A phone number for the contact person. If the person has a direct number, this is that number.

Element.Name: Contact email address
Element.Description: The e-mail address for the contact person. If the person has a direct e-mail this is that email.

Element.Name: Despatch information
Element.Description: The despatch (pickup) associated with this delivery.

Element.Name: Despatch location
Element.Description: The location from where the goods is despatched.

Element.Name: Identity of the delivery location
Element.Description: Identifies the delivery location.

Element.Name: Name of the despatch location
Element.Description: The name of the despatch location.

Element.Name: Address of the despatch location
Element.Description: The address of the despatch location.

Element.Name: Address line 1
Element.Description: The main address line in a postal address usually the street name and number.

Element.Name: Address line 2
Element.Description: An additional address line in a postal address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line. Common use are secondary house number in a complex or in a building.

Element.Name: City
Element.Description: The common name of the city where the postal address is. The name is written in full rather than as a code.

Element.Name: Post code
Element.Description: The identifier for an addressable group of properties according to the relevant national postal service, such as a ZIP code or Post Code.

Element.Name: Country subdivision
Element.Description: For specifying a region, county, state, province etc. within a country by using text.

Element.Name: Address line
Element.Description: An additional address line in an address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line.

Element.Name: Address line 3
Element.Description: An additional address line in an address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line.

Element.Name: Country code.
Element.Description: Country.

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: A code that identifies the country. The lists of valid countries are registered with the ISO 3166-1 Maintenance agency, "Codes for the representation of names of countries and their subdivisions". Codes must be according to the alpha-2 representation.

Element.Name: Location coordinate
Element.Description: To specify the coordinates.

Element.Name: Coordinate system code
Element.Description: Always "EPSG:3857" by definition.

Element.Name: Latitude degrees
Element.Description: The X coordinate. Use degrees with decimals.

Attribute.Name: Latitude degrees unit of measure
Attribute.Description: The unit of measure that applies to the latitude degrees.

Element.Name: Longitude degrees
Element.Description: The Y coordinate. Use degrees with decimals.

Attribute.Name: Longitude degrees unit of measure
Attribute.Description: The unit of measure that applies to the longitude degrees.

Element.Name: Despatch Party
Element.Description: The party despatching the goods.

Element.Name: Party Identification
Element.Description: Party identification

Element.Name: Identity of the Despatching Party.
Element.Description: Identifies the Despatching Party.

Element.Name: Party Name
Element.Description: Party Name

Element.Name: Name of the Consignor.
Element.Description: The name of the Consignor.

Element.Name: Address of the Consignor.
Element.Description: The address of the Consignor.

Element.Name: Address line 1
Element.Description: The name of the street, road, avenue, way, etc. to which the number of the building is attached.

Element.Name: Address line 2
Element.Description: An additional street name used to further clarify the address.

Element.Name: City
Element.Description: The common name of the city where the postal address is. The name is written in full rather than as a code.

Element.Name: Post code
Element.Description: The identifier for an addressable group of properties according to the relevant national postal service, such as a ZIP code or Post Code.

Element.Name: Country subdivision
Element.Description: For specifying a region, county, state, province etc. within a country by using text.

Element.Name: Address line 3
Element.Description: Additional address information.

Element.Name: Address line 3
Element.Description: Used for any other additional address information

Element.Name: Country for Consignor.
Element.Description: Country.

Element.Name: Country code.
Element.Description: Country Code.

Element.Name: Consignor Contact information
Element.Description: Contact information

Element.Name: Contact person name
Element.Description: The name of the contact person.

Element.Name: Contact telephone number
Element.Description: A phone number for the contact person. If the person has a direct number, this is that number.

Element.Name: Contact email address
Element.Description: The e-mail address for the contact person. If the person has a direct e-mail this is that email.

Element.Name: Estimated Despatch Period
Element.Description: Intended period for shipments.

Element.Name: Start Date
Element.Description: Start date of the period.

Element.Name: End Date
Element.Description: End date of the period.

Element.Name: Reference to relevant documents
Element.Description: Reference to any documents relevant for this Waste Notification.

Element.Name: Identity of the referenced document
Element.Description: The reference number of the document

Element.Name: Attachment
Element.Description: Group to describe an attached document. An attachment can refer to an external document or be included with the document being exchanged.

Element.Name: Embedded binary object
Element.Description: The referenced document can here be inserted as a binary object.

Element.Name: External reference
Element.Description: A reference to an attached document that is external to the document(s) being exchanged.

Element.Name: Address to internet resource
Element.Description: The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that identifies the external object as an Internet resource.
